house_listing.house_description: Deville-careful attention to the exterior architectural gives the appearance of being a spacious custom home. Huge 2 car garage, 3 bedrooms ventless gas fireplace w/marble surround, intercom system whirlpool tub w/sep. Shower. Best price for area.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Balcony, Cable TV, Fenced, Garage Door Opener, Intercom System,Outside Sprinkler System, Pantry, Utility Room, Walk-In Closet(s)
